an10.116:1.1: Atha kho ajito paribbajako yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi.
an10.116:1.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ajito paribbajako bhagavantam etadavoca:
an10.116:2.2: Tena pancamattani cittatthanasatani cintitani, yehi annatitthiya uparaddhava jananti uparaddhasma”ti.
an10.116:3.4: yam bhagava bhaseyya, bhagavato sutva bhikkhu dharessanti”ti.
an10.116:4.1: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, sunatha, sadhukam manasi karotha, bhasissami”ti.
an10.116:4.2: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosum.
an10.116:5.1: “Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco adhammikena vadena adhammikam vadam abhinigganhati abhinippileti, tena ca adhammikam parisam ranjeti.
an10.116:5.2: Tena sa adhammika parisa uccasaddamahasadda hoti:
an10.116:6.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco adhammikena vadena dhammikam vadam abhinigganhati abhinippileti, tena ca adhammikam parisam ranjeti.
an10.116:6.2: Tena sa adhammika parisa uccasaddamahasadda hoti:
an10.116:7.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco adhammikena vadena dhammikanca vadam adhammikanca vadam abhinigganhati abhinippileti, tena ca adhammikam parisam ranjeti.
an10.116:7.2: Tena sa adhammika parisa uccasaddamahasadda hoti:
an10.116:8.1: Adhammo ca, bhikkhave, veditabbo dhammo ca;
an10.116:8.3: Adhammanca viditva dhammanca, anatthanca viditva atthanca yatha dhammo yatha attho tatha patipajjitabbam.
an10.116:9.1: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, adhammo, katamo ca dhammo, katamo ca anattho, katamo ca attho?
an10.116:9.4: ye ca micchaditthipaccaya aneke papaka akusala dhamma sambhavanti, ayam anattho;
an10.116:9.5: sammaditthipaccaya ca aneke kusala dhamma bhavanaparipurim gacchanti, ayam attho.
an10.116:11.3: ye ca micchavimuttipaccaya aneke papaka akusala dhamma sambhavanti, ayam anattho;
an10.116:11.4: sammavimuttipaccaya ca aneke kusala dhamma bhavanaparipurim gacchanti, ayam attho.
an10.116:12.3: Adhammanca viditva dhammanca, anatthanca viditva atthanca yatha dhammo yatha attho tatha patipajjitabban’ti,
an10.116:12.4: iti yam tam vuttam, idametam paticca vuttan”ti.
